mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CONTACT_DB ( DB_SEQ , TITLE , QUST_CNTN , CONTENT , KEY_WORD , REG_DATE , REG_TIME , REG_ID , LST_UPDATE_DATE , LST_UPDATE_TIME , LST_UPDATE_ID , FLAG , PROVE_STATE , CONTACT_DB_GUBUN , RELATION_DEPT_NM , RELATION_DEPT_TEL , RELATION_DEPT_ADMIN , CON1_CD , CON2_CD , CON3_CD , CLASS1_CD , CLASS2_CD , CLASS3_CD , UPDATE_CNT , VIEW_CNT ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(DB_SEQ+1),0) FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CONTACT_DB), #{TITLE}, #{QUST_CNTN}, #{CONTENT}, #{KEY_WORD}, #{REG_DATE}, #{REG_TIME}, #{REG_ID}, #{LST_UPDATE_DATE}, #{LST_UPDATE_TIME}, #{LST_UPDATE_ID}, #{FLAG}, '0', #{CONTACT_DB_GUBUN}, #{RELATION_DEPT_NM}, #{RELATION_DEPT_TEL}, #{RELATION_DEPT_ADMIN}, #{CON1_CD}, #{CON2_CD}, #{CON3_CD}, #{CLASS1_CD}, #{CLASS2_CD}, #{CLASS3_CD}, 0, 0 )

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CONTACT_DB A, ( SELECT USER_ID LGN_ID FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_USER UNION SELECT LGN_ID USER_ID FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_USER ) B WHERE A.REG_ID = B.LGN_ID AND A.PROVE_STATE = #{PROVE_STATE} AND A.LST_UPDATE_DATE BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{tStartDate},'%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{tEndDate},'%Y%m%d')
AND A.FLAG LIKE CONCAT('%',#{FLAG},'%')
AND A.CONTACT_DB_GUBUN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTACT_DB_GUBUN},'%')
AND A.CON1_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CON1_CD},'%')
AND A.CON2_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CON2_CD},'%')
AND A.CON3_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CON3_CD},'%')
AND A.CLASS1_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CLASS1_CD},'%')
AND A.CLASS2_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CLASS2_CD},'%')
AND A.CLASS3_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CLASS3_CD},'%')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC, REG_TIME DESC) AS rn , DB_SEQ , TITLE , CONTENT , (SELECT BSWR_CLSF_NM FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD WHERE BSWR_CLSF_CD=A.FLAG) AS FLAG_NAME , ( CASE WHEN A.LST_UPDATE_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.LST_UPDATE_DATE, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d '),' ',DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.LST_UPDATE_TIME, '%H%i%s'),'%H:%i:%s ')) ELSE CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.REG_DATE, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d '),' ',DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.REG_TIME, '%H%i%s'),'%H:%i:%s ') ) END ) AS LST_DAY , UPDATE_CNT , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CODEBOOK WHERE CODE_TYPE = 'CONTACT_DB_GUBUN' AND CODE_ID = A.CONTACT_DB_GUBUN) AS CONTACT_DB_GUBUN_NAME , B.USER_NM AS USER_NM , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NM FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_USER WHERE LGN_ID = A.LST_UPDATE_ID),'') AS UPDATE_NM , IFNULL((SELECT TEAM_NM FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_CONS_TEAM WHERE TEAM_CD = B.TEAM_CD),'') AS POST_NAME , CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.REG_DATE, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d '),' ',DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.REG_TIME, '%H%i%s'),'%H:%i:%s ') ) AS REG_DAY , A.FLAG AS FLAG , IFNULL(A.LST_UPDATE_ID,'') AS LST_UPDATE_ID FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CONTACT_DB A, ( SELECT USER_ID LGN_ID, USER_NAME USER_NM, USER_DEPT TEAM_CD FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_USER UNION SELECT LGN_ID, USER_NM, TEAM_CD FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_USER ) B WHERE A.REG_ID = B.LGN_ID AND A.PROVE_STATE = #{PROVE_STATE} AND A.LST_UPDATE_DATE BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{tStartDate},'%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{tEndDate},'%Y%m%d')
AND A.FLAG LIKE CONCAT('%',#{FLAG},'%')
AND A.CONTACT_DB_GUBUN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTACT_DB_GUBUN},'%')
AND A.CON1_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CON1_CD},'%')
AND A.CON2_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CON2_CD},'%')
AND A.CON3_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CON3_CD},'%')
AND A.CLASS1_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CLASS1_CD},'%')
AND A.CLASS2_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CLASS2_CD},'%')
AND A.CLASS3_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CLASS3_CD},'%')
) AB ) A WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startlist} AND #{listsize}

WITH UR AS ( SELECT '' CODE_ID , '전체' CODE_NAME , IF( CONCAT('',#{CODE_ID}) = '','1','0' ) AS SELECTED UNION ALL SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , SELECTED FROM ( SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , IF( CONCAT('',#{CODE_ID}) = CODE_ID,'1','0' ) AS SELECTED FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CODEBOOK WHERE USE_YN ='1' AND CODE_TYPE=#{CODE_TYPE} ORDER BY CODE_ID ) A ) SELECT * FROM UR ORDER BY CODE_ID

SELECT '' CODE_ID , '전체' CODE_NAME , IF( CONCAT('',#{CLASS1_CD}) = '','1','0' ) AS SELECTED UNION ALL SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , IF( CODE_ID = CONCAT('',#{CLASS1_CD}),'1','0' ) AS SELECTED FROM ( SELECT CLASS1 CODE_ID , CLASS1_NM CODE_NAME FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OMV_NEW_DEPT A GROUP BY CLASS1,CLASS1_NM ORDER BY CLASS1 ) A ORDER BY CODE_ID

SELECT '' CODE_ID , '전체' CODE_NAME , IF( CONCAT('',#{CLASS2_CD}) = '','1','0' ) AS SELECTED UNION ALL SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , IF( CODE_ID = CONCAT('',#{CLASS2_CD}),'1','0' ) AS SELECTED FROM ( SELECT CLASS2 CODE_ID , CLASS2_NM CODE_NAME FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OMV_NEW_DEPT A WHERE CLASS1 = #{CLASS1_CD} GROUP BY CLASS2,CLASS2_NM ORDER BY CLASS2 ) A ORDER BY CODE_ID

SELECT '' CODE_ID , '전체' CODE_NAME , IF( CONCAT('',#{CLASS3_CD}) = '','1','0' ) AS SELECTED
UNION ALL SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , IF( CODE_ID = CONCAT('',#{CLASS3_CD}),'1','0' ) AS SELECTED FROM ( SELECT DEPT_CD CODE_ID , DEPT_NAME CODE_NAME FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OMV_NEW_DEPT A WHERE CLASS1 = #{CLASS1_CD} AND CLASS2 = #{CLASS2_CD} GROUP BY DEPT_CD,DEPT_NAME ORDER BY DEPT_CD ) A ORDER BY CODE_ID

SELECT '' CODE_ID , '전체' CODE_NAME , IF( CONCAT('',#{CON1_CD}) = '','1','0' ) AS SELECTED UNION ALL SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , IF( CODE_ID = CONCAT('',#{CON1_CD}),'1','0' ) AS SELECTED FROM ( SELECT BSWR_CLSF_CD CODE_ID , BSWR_CLSF_NM CODE_NAME FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD WHERE USE_YN ='Y' AND HGRN_BSWR_CLSF_CD = #{CODE_ID} ORDER BY BSWR_CLSF_CD ) A ORDER BY CODE_ID

SELECT '' CODE_ID , '전체' CODE_NAME , IF( CONCAT('',#{CON2_CD}) = '','1','0' ) AS SELECTED UNION ALL SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , IF( CODE_ID = CONCAT('',#{CON2_CD}),'1','0' ) AS SELECTED FROM ( SELECT BSWR_CLSF_CD CODE_ID ,BSWR_CLSF_NM CODE_NAME FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD WHERE USE_YN ='Y' AND HGRN_BSWR_CLSF_CD = #{CON1_CD} ORDER BY BSWR_CLSF_CD ) A ORDER BY CODE_ID

SELECT '' CODE_ID , '전체' CODE_NAME , IF( CONCAT('',#{CON3_CD}) = '','1','0' ) AS SELECTED UNION ALL SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , IF( CODE_ID = CONCAT('',#{CON3_CD}),'1','0' ) AS SELECTED FROM ( SELECT BSWR_CLSF_CD CODE_ID , BSWR_CLSF_NM CODE_NAME FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD WHERE USE_YN ='Y' AND HGRN_BSWR_CLSF_CD = #{CON2_CD} ORDER BY BSWR_CLSF_CD ) A ORDER BY CODE_ID

SELECT '' CODE_ID , '전체' CODE_NAME , IF( CONCAT('',#{POST_CD}) = '','1','0' ) AS SELECTED UNION ALL SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , FLAG FROM ( SELECT BSWR_CLSF_CD AS CODE_ID , BSWR_CLSF_NM AS CODE_NAME , BSWR_CLSF_LVL_CNT AS BSWR_CLSF_LVL_CNT , ( CASE WHEN #{POST_CD} LIKE 'TA0%' OR #{POST_CD} LIKE 'T20%' OR #{POST_CD} LIKE 'T3010%' OR #{POST_CD} LIKE 'T10%' THEN 'CT01000000' WHEN #{POST_CD} LIKE 'T3020%' THEN 'CT02000000' WHEN #{POST_CD} LIKE 'T3050%' THEN 'CT03000000' WHEN #{POST_CD} LIKE 'T40%' OR #{POST_CD} LIKE 'T3040%' THEN 'CT04000000' WHEN #{POST_CD} LIKE 'T50%' OR #{POST_CD} LIKE 'T3030%' THEN 'CT05000000' ELSE 'CT01000000' END ) AS FLAG FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD WHERE USE_YN ='Y' ) A WHERE CODE_ID = FLAG ORDER BY CODE_ID

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '' CODE_ID , '전체' CODE_NAME , IF( CONCAT('',#{CODE_ID}) = '','1','0') AS SELECTED UNION ALL SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , IF( CODE_ID = CONCAT('',#{CODE_ID}),'1','0' ) AS SELECTED FROM ( SELECT BSWR_CLSF_CD AS CODE_ID , BSWR_CLSF_NM AS CODE_NAME , BSWR_CLSF_LVL_CNT FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD WHERE USE_YN ='Y' AND BSWR_CLSF_LVL_CNT = 1 ) ) A WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY CODE_ID

SELECT DB_SEQ , TITLE , QUST_CNTN , CONTENT , (SELECT TEAM_NM FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_CONS_TEAM WHERE TEAM_CD = B.TEAM_CD) AS POST_NAME , B.USER_NM AS USER_NM , (SELECT BSWR_CLSF_NM FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD WHERE BSWR_CLSF_CD = A.FLAG) AS FLAG_NAME , KEY_WORD , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CODEBOOK WHERE CODE_TYPE = 'CONTACT_DB_GUBUN' AND CODE_ID = A.CONTACT_DB_GUBUN) AS CONTACT_DB_GUBUN_NAME , REG_DATE , REG_TIME , REG_ID , LST_UPDATE_DATE , LST_UPDATE_TIME , LST_UPDATE_ID , A.FLAG AS FLAG , C.CLASS1_NM AS CLASS1_NM , C.CLASS2_NM AS CLASS2_NM , C.DEPT_NAME AS CLASS3_NM , (SELECT BSWR_CLSF_NM FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD WHERE BSWR_CLSF_CD = A.CON1_CD) AS CON1_NM , (SELECT BSWR_CLSF_NM FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD WHERE BSWR_CLSF_CD = A.CON2_CD) AS CON2_NM , (SELECT BSWR_CLSF_NM FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD WHERE BSWR_CLSF_CD = A.CON3_CD) AS CON3_NM , A.RELATION_DEPT_NM AS RELATION_DEPT_NM , A.RELATION_DEPT_TEL AS RELATION_DEPT_TEL , A.RELATION_DEPT_ADMIN AS RELATION_DEPT_ADMIN , A.CON1_CD AS CON1_CD , A.CON2_CD AS CON2_CD , A.CON3_CD AS CON3_CD , A.CLASS1_CD AS CLASS1_CD , A.CLASS2_CD AS CLASS2_CD , A.CLASS3_CD AS CLASS3_CD , A.CONTACT_DB_GUBUN AS CONTACT_DB_GUBUN , A.UPDATE_CNT AS UPDATE_CNT , A.PROVE_STATE AS PROVE_STATE FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CONTACT_DB A, ( SELECT USER_ID LGN_ID, USER_NAME USER_NM, USER_DEPT TEAM_CD FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_USER UNION SELECT LGN_ID, USER_NM, TEAM_CD FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_USER ) B, DB_HOMEPAGE.OMV_NEW_DEPT C, DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD D WHERE A.DB_SEQ = #{DB_SEQ} AND A.REG_ID = B.LGN_ID AND A.CLASS1_CD = C.CLASS1(+) AND A.CLASS2_CD = C.CLASS2(+) AND A.CLASS3_CD = C.DEPT_CD(+) AND A.CON1_CD = D.BSWR_CLSF_CD(+) AND A.CON2_CD = D.BSWR_CLSF_CD(+) AND A.CON3_CD = D.BSWR_CLSF_CD(+) AND A.FLAG = D.HGRN_BSWR_CLSF_CD(+)

SELECT C.rn AS rn ,C.CON1_NM AS CON1_NM ,C.CON2_NM AS CON2_NM ,C.CON3_NM AS CON3_NM ,C.CON1_CD AS CON1_CD ,C.CON2_CD AS CON2_CD ,C.CON3_CD AS CON3_CD FROM ( SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BSWR_CLSF3_CD DESC) AS rn, CONS_TYP2_NM AS CON1_NM, CONS_TYP3_NM AS CON2_NM, CONS_TYP4_NM AS CON3_NM, BSWR_CLSF1_CD AS CON1_CD, BSWR_CLSF2_CD AS CON2_CD, BSWR_CLSF3_CD AS CON3_CD, ASP_ORGZ_INFO_CD AS FLAG FROM ( SELECT A.BSWR_CLSF_NM AS CONS_TYP1_NM , RTRIM(B.BSWR_CLSF_NM) AS CONS_TYP2_NM , RTRIM(C.BSWR_CLSF_NM) AS CONS_TYP3_NM , RTRIM(D.BSWR_CLSF_NM) AS CONS_TYP4_NM , A.BSWR_CLSF_SQNC , A.BSWR_CLSF_CD AS ASP_ORGZ_INFO_CD , B.BSWR_CLSF_CD AS BSWR_CLSF1_CD , C.BSWR_CLSF_CD AS BSWR_CLSF2_CD , D.BSWR_CLSF_CD AS BSWR_CLSF3_CD , CONCAT( RTRIM(B.BSWR_CLSF_NM) , ' ' , RTRIM(C.BSWR_CLSF_NM) , ' ' , RTRIM(D.BSWR_CLSF_NM) ) AS KEY_STR FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD A , DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD B , DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD C , DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD D WHERE A.BSWR_CLSF_CD = B.HGRN_BSWR_CLSF_CD AND B.BSWR_CLSF_CD = C.HGRN_BSWR_CLSF_CD AND C.BSWR_CLSF_CD = D.HGRN_BSWR_CLSF_CD AND ( (A.BSWR_CLSF_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{popupWord},' ','%'),'%')) OR (B.BSWR_CLSF_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{popupWord},' ','%'),'%')) OR (C.BSWR_CLSF_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{popupWord},' ','%'),'%')) OR (D.BSWR_CLSF_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{popupWord},' ','%'),'%')) ) ) A WHERE 1=1 AND ( (CONS_TYP2_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{popupWord},' ','%'),'%')) OR (CONS_TYP3_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{popupWord},' ','%'),'%')) OR (CONS_TYP4_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{popupWord},' ','%'),'%')) OR (KEY_STR LIKE CONCAT('%',REPLACE(#{popupWord},' ','%'),'%')) ) AND ASP_ORGZ_INFO_CD =#{flag} ) B ) C ORDER BY rn desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CLASS1 DESC ,CLASS2 DESC,DEPT_CD DESC) AS rn , CLASS1_NM AS CLASS1_NM , CLASS2_NM AS CLASS2_NM , DEPT_NAME AS CLASS3_NM , CLASS1 AS CLASS1_CD , CLASS2 AS CLASS2_CD , DEPT_CD AS CLASS3_CD FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OMV_NEW_DEPT WHERE DEPT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{popupClassWord},'%') ) A ORDER BY rn DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DB_HIS_SEQ DESC) AS rn ,A.DB_HIS_SEQ AS DB_HIS_SEQ ,CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.LST_UPDATE_DATE, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d '),' ',DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.LST_UPDATE_TIME, '%H%i%s'),'%H:%i:%s ') ) AS LST_DAY ,A.UPDATE_MEMO AS UPDATE_MEMO ,IFNULL((SELECT USER_NM FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_USER WHERE LGN_ID=A.LST_UPDATE_ID),'') AS UPDATE_NM ,(SELECT CODE_NAME FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CODEBOOK WHERE CODE_TYPE='PROVE_STATE' AND CODE_ID=A.PROVE_STATE) AS PROVE_STATE ,IFNULL(A.LST_UPDATE_ID,'') AS LST_UPDATE_ID FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CONTACT_DB_HIS A WHERE PARENT_DB_SEQ = #{PARENT_DB_SEQ} ORDER BY DB_HIS_SEQ DESC ) A WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startlist} AND #{listsize}

SELECT DB_HIS_SEQ AS DB_HIS_SEQ ,TITLE AS TITLE ,QUST_CNTN AS QUST_CNTN ,CONTENT AS CONTENT ,(SELECT TEAM_NM FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_CONS_TEAM WHERE TEAM_CD = B.TEAM_CD) AS POST_NAME ,B.USER_NM AS USER_NM ,(SELECT BSWR_CLSF_NM FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD WHERE BSWR_CLSF_CD = A.FLAG) AS FLAG_NAME ,KEY_WORD AS KEY_WORD ,(SELECT CODE_NAME FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CODEBOOK WHERE CODE_TYPE = 'CONTACT_DB_GUBUN' AND CODE_ID = A.CONTACT_DB_GUBUN) AS CONTACT_DB_GUBUN_NAME ,REG_DATE ,REG_TIME ,REG_ID ,LST_UPDATE_DATE ,LST_UPDATE_TIME ,LST_UPDATE_ID ,A.FLAG as FLAG ,C.CLASS1_NM AS CLASS1_NM ,C.CLASS2_NM AS CLASS2_NM ,C.DEPT_NAME AS CLASS3_NM ,(SELECT BSWR_CLSF_NM FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD WHERE BSWR_CLSF_CD = A.CON1_CD) AS CON1_NM ,(SELECT BSWR_CLSF_NM FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD WHERE BSWR_CLSF_CD = A.CON2_CD) AS CON2_NM ,(SELECT BSWR_CLSF_NM FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD WHERE BSWR_CLSF_CD = A.CON3_CD) AS CON3_NM ,A.RELATION_DEPT_NM AS RELATION_DEPT_NM ,A.RELATION_DEPT_TEL AS RELATION_DEPT_TEL ,A.RELATION_DEPT_ADMIN AS RELATION_DEPT_ADMIN ,A.CON1_CD AS CON1_CD ,A.CON2_CD AS CON2_CD ,A.CON3_CD AS CON3_CD ,A.CLASS1_CD AS CLASS1_CD ,A.CLASS2_CD AS CLASS2_CD ,A.CLASS3_CD AS CLASS3_CD ,A.CONTACT_DB_GUBUN AS CONTACT_DB_GUBUN FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CONTACT_DB_HIS A, ( SELECT USER_ID LGN_ID, USER_NAME USER_NM, USER_DEPT TEAM_CD FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_USER UNION SELECT LGN_ID, USER_NM, TEAM_CD FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_USER ) B, DB_HOMEPAGE.OMV_NEW_DEPT C, DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_BSWR_CLSF_CD D WHERE A.DB_HIS_SEQ = #{DB_HIS_SEQ} AND A.REG_ID = B.LGN_ID AND A.CLASS1_CD = C.CLASS1(+) AND A.CLASS2_CD = C.CLASS2(+) AND A.CLASS3_CD = C.DEPT_CD(+) AND A.CON1_CD = D.BSWR_CLSF_CD(+) AND A.CON2_CD = D.BSWR_CLSF_CD(+) AND A.CON3_CD = D.BSWR_CLSF_CD(+) AND A.FLAG = D.HGRN_BSWR_CLSF_CD(+)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CONTACT_DB_HIS SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(DB_HIS_SEQ+1),0) FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CONTACT_DB_HIS) ,DB_SEQ ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,KEY_WORD ,REG_DATE ,REG_TIME ,REG_ID ,LST_UPDATE_DATE ,LST_UPDATE_TIME ,LST_UPDATE_ID ,FLAG ,PROVE_STATE ,CONTACT_DB_GUBUN ,RELATION_DEPT_NM ,RELATION_DEPT_TEL ,RELATION_DEPT_ADMIN ,CON1_CD ,CON2_CD ,CON3_CD ,CLASS1_CD ,CLASS2_CD ,CLASS3_CD ,#{UPDATE_MEMO} UPDATE_MEMO ,QUST_CNTN FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CONTACT_DB WHERE DB_SEQ = #{DB_SEQ}
mapper.update: UPDATE DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CONTACT_DB SET VIEW_CNT = IFNULL(VIEW_CNT,0)+1 WHERE DB_SEQ = #{DB_SEQ}
